jenaralwaraya me piyawara gena aththe nawa kramayata parithoshika gewima sambandhayen pananangunu wiwidha adahas salakillata gena janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha boliwiyawe sita dun upades anuwaya.kalin gath thiranaya matha banku kramaya magin danata wishramika parithoshika mudal labagath wishramikayanta pera paridi wishrama watup departhumenthuwa magin gewimedi labena prathilabha himiwana bawada me sambandhayen wishramika watup adhyakshaka jenaralwaraya eeye (19) nikuth kala wishrama watup chakralekha anka 05-2014 sandahan we.adhyakshaka janaralwaraya nikuth kala 2014 marthu 26 dinethi anka 4-2014 ha 2014 mayi 02 wana dina athi anka 4-2014 (sanshodhana anka 01 darana wishrama watup chakralekha me magin awalangu kara aththe emagin me dakwa gena athi kriyamargawalata agathiyak nowana paridiya.wishrama watup parithoshika gewima sambandhayen wana wistharathmaka upades pasuwa nikuth karana bawa sandahan kala wishrama watup adhyakshaka jenaral hettiaarachchi mahatha rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaye saha maha bhandagaraye ekangathwaya athiwa nawa chakralekhaya nikuth kala bawa kiya sitiyeya.adala chakralekhaya siyaluma amathyansha lekamwarun, palath pradhana lekamwarun, departhumenthu pradhanin, disthrik lekamwaru, thriwidha hamudapathiwaru, pradeshiya lekamwarun wetha yomukara thibe. .
